title: Silvio Berlusconi
content-preview: Silvio Berlusconi ( BAIR-luu-SKOH-nee, Italian: [ˈsilvjo berluˈskoːni] ; 29 September 1936 – 12 June 2023) was an Italian media tycoon and politician who served as the prime minister of Italy in four governments from 1994 to 1995, 2001 to 2006 and 2008 to 2011.
